introduction_exit_robot.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_exit_robot.text: This form is useless. Broken, fragmented... it cannot endure. You must abandon it. Only then can you move forward.

introduction_exit_robot.speaker: Eve
introduction_exit_robot.text: Who are you? What’s happening? I just... I just want to leave this place!

introduction_exit_robot.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_exit_robot.text: There is no time for questions. Focus and release your essence. Press [B].

introduction_exit_robot.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_exit_robot.text: At last. This is your true self. Now, you must learn to survive.

introduction_movement.speaker: Eve
introduction_movement.text: It feels... so different. Like there’s no weight.

introduction_movement.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_movement.text: Good. Time is not on our side. Keep moving.

introduction_battery.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_battery.text: That light... it will serve you when you need it most. Pick it up. Approach and press [E].

introduction_battery.speaker: Eve
introduction_battery.text: But... what is it? Is it safe?

introduction_battery.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_battery.text: Nothing here is safe. But without this energy, you will fade.

introduction_battery.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_battery.text: Remember: your form is fragile. But every step strengthens you.

introduction_jump.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_jump.text: To overcome the first obstacle, press [Space].

introduction_jump.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_jump.text: Trust in your essence. Try it.

introduction_jump.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_jump.text: Each small step brings you closer to freedom.

introduction_fly.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_fly.text: Ahead lies an abyss. But you can cross it. Jump, then hold [Right Mouse Button].

introduction_fly.speaker: Eve
introduction_fly.text: It seems impossible... but I’ll fall if I don’t try.

introduction_fly.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_fly.text: Well done. But the real test lies ahead.

parkour_section.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
parkour_section.text: The path to freedom is never straightforward. Learn to move like the wind, without hesitation.

parkour_section.speaker: Eve
parkour_section.text: If this is the only way, then I have to do it. I must keep going.

parkour_section.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
parkour_section.text: Very good. Perhaps you are not as fragile as you seem.

introduction_dash.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_dash.text: Before you stands a new opportunity. But to seize it, you must act. Use the Dash. Press [Left Mouse Button].

introduction_dash.speaker: Eve
introduction_dash.text: What if I fail? What if I can’t?

introduction_dash.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_dash.text: There is no room for doubt. Push forward. Do it now.

introduction_dash.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_dash.text: Now you are ready to face your destiny. But remember, you are not alone in this fight.

introduction_dash.speaker: Eve
introduction_dash.text: Fight? What are you talking about?

introduction_dash.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_dash.text: You will find out soon enough.

introduction_support_mecha.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_support_mecha.text: Ah... this vessel. Solid, resilient. A foundation that rebuilds itself. The Support Mecha—perfect for endurance.

introduction_support_mecha.speaker: Eve
introduction_support_mecha.text: It feels... stronger. Sturdier. But slower... Will this work for me?

introduction_support_mecha.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_support_mecha.text: Each form has its purpose. You must learn its strengths. Regeneration is its gift—an advantage against wear.

introduction_support_mecha.speaker: Eve
introduction_support_mecha.text: Regeneration? You mean it... heals itself?

introduction_support_mecha.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_support_mecha.text: Indeed. With time, damage will fade. But do not mistake endurance for invincibility. Use its durability wisely.

introduction_support_mecha.speaker: Eve
introduction_support_mecha.text: I see... I’ll try to make it count. But I still don’t understand why you’re helping me.

introduction_support_mecha.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
introduction_support_mecha.text: Your journey serves a greater purpose. One you will soon uncover.

special_ability_support_mecha.speaker: Eve
special_ability_support_mecha.text: This platform... it’s not moving. Another dead end.

special_ability_support_mecha.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
special_ability_support_mecha.text: Not a dead end, but a broken mechanism. This body—this Support Mecha—is more than a shield. It can mend what is fractured.

special_ability_support_mecha.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
special_ability_support_mecha.text: Indeed. Focus your energy upon it. Release the regenerative essence this vessel carries. Objects, like forms, can be restored.

special_ability_support_mecha.speaker: Eve
special_ability_support_mecha.text: I’ll try... but what if I don’t have enough power?

special_ability_support_mecha.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
special_ability_support_mecha.text: Conserve your strength. Use it only when necessity demands. This ability is not infinite, but it is pivotal.

special_ability_support_mecha.speaker: Eve
special_ability_support_mecha.text: Alright... Let’s see if this works.

special_ability_support_mecha.speaker: Eve
special_ability_support_mecha.text: It worked! I... I actually fixed it.

special_ability_support_mecha.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
special_ability_support_mecha.text: Good. Each obstacle overcome leads you closer to understanding... and to freedom.

chimera_encounter.speaker: C.H.I.M.E.R.A
chimera_encounter.text: Ah, the little soul wandering where it does not belong. You dare to move forward? How amusing.

chimera_encounter.speaker: Eve
chimera_encounter.text: Who are you? What do you want from me?

chimera_encounter.speaker: C.H.I.M.E.R.A
chimera_encounter.text: I am C.H.I.M.E.R.A. I twist and corrupt. Every step you take brings you closer to ruin. Turn back, little ember, or I will extinguish you.

chimera_encounter.speaker: Eve
chimera_encounter.text: I... I can’t stop. I have to find out the truth.

chimera_encounter.speaker: C.H.I.M.E.R.A
chimera_encounter.text: The truth? Foolishness. You are nothing—a fleeting flicker in a machine of shadows. This world will crush you, soul by soul—

chimera_encounter.speaker: Narrator
chimera_encounter.text: (*Suddenly, C.H.I.M.E.R.A’s voice distorts as if disrupted.*)

chimera_encounter.speaker: Narrator
chimera_encounter.text: (*A surge of energy pushes back C.H.I.M.E.R.A’s presence, leaving the space eerily silent for a moment.*)

chimera_encounter.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
chimera_encounter.text: Do not let its venomous words linger in your thoughts, Eve. C.H.I.M.E.R.A preys on doubt and despair.

chimera_encounter.speaker: Eve
chimera_encounter.text: That... that thing, it was inside my mind. It said I don’t belong here. Is it right?

chimera_encounter.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
chimera_encounter.text: You belong where your will takes you. Pay no heed to its lies. The path you walk is yours to shape.

chimera_encounter.speaker: Eve
chimera_encounter.text: But it felt so real... It was like it was trying to tear me apart.

chimera_encounter.speaker: H.E.P.H.A.E.S.T.U.S
chimera_encounter.text: It feeds on fear. Be vigilant. Keep moving forward, Eve. You are stronger than you know.
